title: Goodbye Create React App, Hello TanStack Create React App
author: Loraine Lawson
description: In other developer news: Anaconda is offering a new natural language, AI-tool for data; and Vercel adds support for React Router v7 Apps.
cntitle: 再见Create React App，你好TanStack Create React App
cndescription: 其他开发者新闻：Anaconda 提供了一个新的自然语言 AI 数据工具；Vercel增加了对 React Router v7 应用的支持。
